user_prompt: Create Epics and User Stories for the usecase

epics.title: Customer Authentication and Security
epics.summary: Implement secure multi-factor authentication and session management for portal access.
epics.description: Develop a robust authentication system leveraging multi-factor authentication (MFA) to ensure secure customer access. Implement secure session handling, password management, and login attempt monitoring. Integrate encryption protocols for data in transit and at rest. The system must comply with banking security standards and regulatory requirements to protect sensitive financial information from unauthorized access or breaches.

epics.title: Responsive User Interface and Dashboard
epics.summary: Design and build a responsive, user-friendly interface with a personalized dashboard.
epics.description: Create an intuitive and responsive front-end design compatible across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. The personalized dashboard must display customer-specific products and services, account summaries, and shortcuts for key actions. Ensure accessibility standards are met and the interface delivers consistent performance and usability across all supported platforms.

epics.title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
epics.summary: Implement role-based access controls to manage customer data visibility.
epics.description: Develop and enforce role-based access controls to ensure customers can only view and perform actions permitted by their authorization level. Support dynamic role definitions tied to customer profiles and implement secure authorization checks across all portal modules. Integrate audit logging to track access and manage compliance with internal and regulatory policies.

epics.title: Account Opening and Service Requests Workflow
epics.summary: Enable customers to submit account opening and service modification requests digitally.
epics.description: Build a workflow engine that allows customers to initiate, submit, and track requests for new account openings and service modifications through an intuitive, guided process. Minimize required clicks by providing smart forms, field validation, and pre-filled data where applicable. Enable real-time validation and routing logic to ensure efficient submission and processing of requests.

epics.title: Real-Time Status Tracking and Notifications
epics.summary: Provide real-time updates and email/SMS notifications for customer requests.
epics.description: Implement a communication and notification framework that informs customers of the status of their submitted requests in real-time. Integrate email and SMS notification services for key lifecycle events, from submission acknowledgment to completion. Present dynamic status updates within the dashboard to enhance transparency and user engagement.

epics.title: Application Draft Saving and Document Upload
epics.summary: Allow customers to save incomplete applications and upload required documents.
epics.description: Enable users to save partially completed forms or requests and return to them later without data loss. Develop secure document upload functionality supporting common file formats. Ensure uploaded files are encrypted, validated for security compliance, and accessible for processing through back-office workflows.

epics.title: Core Banking System Integration
epics.summary: Integrate the self-service portal with existing core banking systems and data sources.
epics.description: Establish seamless integration between the self-service portal and the bank's core systems using secure APIs and message queues. Implement data synchronization to ensure updates reflect across systems in real-time. Design the integration layer to handle transaction reliability, fault tolerance, and version control, guaranteeing consistent customer data flow and high system uptime.

epics.title: Portal Data Management and Performance Optimization
epics.summary: Develop and maintain a dedicated database for the portal to optimize performance and reliability.
epics.description: Create a dedicated portal database designed for scalability and high availability. Maintain separate yet synchronized data stores to reduce dependencies on the core banking system for user interactions. Implement caching, indexing, and query optimization to achieve fast response times, and design backup/recovery strategies to ensure data integrity and minimal downtime.

epics.title: Activity History and Audit Logging
epics.summary: Maintain a comprehensive interaction history and full audit log.
epics.description: Implement a detailed logging mechanism to capture all user interactions, transactions, and workflow activities within the portal. Provide users access to their historical records for transparency and support internal investigations. Ensure audit logs are immutable, time-stamped, and meet security and compliance requirements for financial data management.

user_stories.title: Develop Multi-Factor Authentication
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to use multi-factor authentication, so that I can securely log in to my account with an extra layer of protection.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Implement support for various MFA methods such as SMS, email, and authenticator apps.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. User can enable MFA from the settings.
2. User receives a code from the chosen MFA method.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with MFA enabled, when they login, then they should be prompted to enter a code from their chosen MFA method.

user_stories.title: Implement Password Encryption
user_stories.description: As a user, I want my password to be securely encrypted, so that my account information is protected from unauthorized access.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Use industry-standard encryption algorithms for password storage.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Passwords are stored in an encrypted format.
2. Encrypted passwords can be verified upon login.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user registration, when they create a password, then the password should be stored in an encrypted format.

user_stories.title: Protect Against Common Threats
user_stories.description: As a user, I want protection from threats such as phishing and brute force attacks, so that my account remains secure.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Implement mechanisms to detect and block phishing attempts and limit failed login attempts to prevent brute force attacks.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. System detects and blocks phishing attempts.
2. Account is locked after multiple failed login attempts.
user_stories.test_cases: Given multiple failed login attempts, when a user tries to login again, then the account should be temporarily locked.

user_stories.epic_title: Responsive User Interface and Experience Design
user_stories.title: Design a Modern Responsive Interface
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a visually appealing and responsive interface, so that I can have a consistent experience across all devices.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure the interface is consistent and user-friendly on desktops, tablets, and mobile devices.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. The interface adapts to different screen sizes.
2. Navigation is intuitive on all devices.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user accessing the portal on different devices, when they navigate the interface, then the experience should be consistent and responsive.

user_stories.epic_title: Responsive User Interface and Experience Design
user_stories.title: Prioritize Ease of Navigation
user_stories.description: As a user, I want easy navigation, so that I can quickly access key banking functions.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Implement clear navigation paths and quick access shortcuts.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Key functions are easily accessible from the main interface.
2. Users can navigate with minimal clicks.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user navigating the portal, when they search for key functions, then they should be able to access them quickly and easily.

user_stories.epic_title: Responsive User Interface and Experience Design
user_stories.title: Ensure Accessibility for All Users
user_stories.description: As a user with disabilities, I want an accessible interface, so that I can use the portal effectively.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Incorporate features such as screen reader support, high contrast modes, and keyboard navigation.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. The interface is compatible with screen readers.
2. High contrast and keyboard navigation options are available.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with accessibility needs, when they use the portal, then they should be able to navigate it effectively with the provided accessibility features.

user_stories.title: Build Personalized Dashboard
user_stories.description: As an authenticated user, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can see relevant banking products and services.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Display banking products and services based on user profile, eligibility, and preferences.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Dashboard displays user-specific content.
2. Real-time balances and personalized recommendations are shown.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an authenticated user, when they access the dashboard, then it should display personalized products, services, and real-time information.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
user_stories.title: Create Account Opening Workflow
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a guided account opening workflow, so that I can easily open a new account with minimal effort.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Minimize clicks and provide clear instructions at each step.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Users can open a new account with guided instructions.
2. Workflow integrates seamlessly with internal systems.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user wanting to open a new account, when they follow the guided workflow, then they should be able to complete the process efficiently with minimal clicks.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
user_stories.title: Develop Service Modification Requests
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to modify services through guided workflows, so that I can easily request changes to my existing services.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Provide clear instructions and integrate with internal systems for processing and approval.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Users can request service modifications with guided instructions.
2. Requests are processed and approved through the system.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user wanting to modify a service, when they follow the guided workflow, then they should be able to complete the request efficiently.

user_stories.title: Implement Request Tracking Module
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to track my requests in real-time, so that I can stay updated on their progress.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Provide real-time updates and integrate notifications for status changes.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Users can see the real-time status of their requests.
2. Notifications are sent for status changes.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with an ongoing request, when there are status updates, then they should be able to see real-time changes and receive notifications.

user_stories.title: Enable Secure Document Upload
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to upload necessary documents securely, so that I can provide the required information for my requests.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure documents are uploaded securely and stored with data integrity.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Users can upload necessary documents securely.
2. Uploaded documents are stored securely and with data integrity.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user needing to upload documents, when they upload the required documents, then it should be done securely and stored correctly.

user_stories.title: Allow Saving of Incomplete Applications
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to save my incomplete applications, so that I can resume them later without losing progress.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Enable the system to save incomplete applications securely and support session recovery.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Users can save their incomplete applications.
2. Incomplete applications can be resumed later.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with an incomplete application, when they save their progress, then they should be able to resume it without losing data.

user_stories.title: Create Activity Log Module
user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want a comprehensive activity log, so that I can review all user interactions within the portal.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Record all user activities and interactions for transparency and traceability.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. All user interactions are logged.
2. Logs are easily retrievable and presented in a user-friendly format.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an administrator needing to review interactions, when they access the activity log, then all user actions should be recorded and presented clearly.

user_stories.title: Integrate with Core Banking Systems
user_stories.description: As a user, I want seamless portal integration with core banking systems, so that I can see real-time updates and accurate data.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure real-time data synchronization and secure data transfers.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Portal data is synchronized with core banking systems.
2. Data transfers are secure and seamless.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user accessing the portal, when they perform transactions, then the data should be synchronized in real-time with the core banking systems.

user_stories.title: Establish Role-Based Access Control
user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want to control access based on user roles, so that users only access appropriate services and data.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Configure and enforce role-based access control policies consistently.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Users are restricted to role-appropriate services.
2. Administrators can manage roles efficiently.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with a specific role, when they try to access services, then they should only be able to access those allowed by their role.

architecture_generation.description: This architecture describes a modern, user-friendly self-service banking portal using various Azure resources for frontend, backend, database, integration, monitoring, security, and DevOps capabilities.

architecture_validation.updatedDescription: The architecture diagram has been updated to address critical security and reliability issues by adding a Web Application Firewall (WAF) and disaster recovery components. All nodes and edges have been validated, and placeholders were added for missing references. The architecture now aligns more closely with the Azure Well-Architected Framework, achieving a high-quality rating for security, reliability, and performance.
